name: Hive-Minded
description:
The hive is in need of heroes! Can you fill each tile with bees and bring back the buzz?

Use a variety of pieces to build up the hive! With the power of pollen anything is possible!

Instructions:

The goal is to fill the hive with bees. It's as simple as combining larvae with honey!

But if you want to get creative, mix up some honey and pollen to combine into bees with special abilities!

Created for the  Github Game Off 2021

Music Credits:

Music: Through The Woods by Shane Ivers 

Music: Wallpaper Paste by Shane Ivers

Music: Hide and Seek by Shane Ivers

Music: BEES! by Shane Ivers
